notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: This ethnomedicinal study was approved by the Committee for Scientific Research of Kinshasa University, Faculty of Sciences. During our field investigations, all stakeholders in this study, including healers, local community of Kisantu and Mbanza-Ngungu territories, and all authors willingly agreed to participate in the study, use the data related to their knowledge and publish the results.
